alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:25PM EDT until April 05 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Blair County in central Pennsylvania... East central Cambria County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1025 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just west of Altoona, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altoona, Huntingdon, Hollidaysburg, Tyrone, Lakemont, Bellwood, Gallitzin, Williamsburg, Duncansville, Tipton, Spruce Creek and Birmingham. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 24 to 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Damaging winds and hail are expected. To stay safe, seek shelter inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
